I'm glad I am able to review this game.
honestly one of the best games to ever come out

Portal 2 is just one of if not the best puzzle games of all time and just another iconic series from Valve, the coop mode in this game is sooo fun too.  None of the puzzle are too hard and there's great community support and workshop material even to this day in 2020 plus lore for this game is kinda neat how it connects to Half Life. This is one of my favorite Valve games and one of my favorite games of all time, 10/10 from me.
te ayuda a epnsar y ademas tiene un gameplay muy bueno y al mismo tiempo los comentarios dentro del juego son graciosos y te entretiene junto a la historia
this portal 2 is a amazing sci-fi/puzzle game with funny jokes and well thought levels i rate it 9 out of 10

Amazing. Just amazing.
A great story, great puzzles, and the Workshop community is still very active as well.
Don't get me started on the level editor.
This game is awesome!

If you have played Portal 1, just buy this already! If you have not played portal one, the story does not fully connect so you do not need to know anything about the previous storyline. Despite a bad rap that puzzle games get from the abundance of "point and click games" on steam, portal 2 is the best of the best. We need more 3D puzzle games that are geared to spatial observation and finding ways out of situations. This game is a Valve classic and needs to be on every steam account.
Great game, should have played it sooner but definitely worth a buy.
Portal 2 is hands down the best game ever made. The only thing that could beat it would be Portal 3 but sadly Valve won't let that happen.
nem terminei de jogar mas s√≥ pela voz do wheatley j√° √© um 10/10
Just awesome. Not just the campain, but also endless solo&duo levels thanks to workshop maps :)
Game in it self is legendary and classic.
üëåOne of the best puzzle games ever created

Probably the most successful puzzle game Valve ever made. Good thing this game has cooperative mode. I had so much fun playing this with my friends, really. I totally recommend this game if you seek for an interesting plot and nice multiplayer experience
this game is so epic and cute just like dylan
o jogo e incrivel praticamente um remake do primeiro jogo super recomendo ate mais do que o primeiro
Ich fliege wie ein fetter Adler!!!
Classic valve, comedy, atmosphere, puzzles, it's all fantastic. replay value 100/10

It's absolutely worth every bit of the $10 you spend on it. The story is fantastic (even if you haven't played the first portal game) the animations are beautiful, and overall it's a REALLY well made game.
Pretty nice if you like puzzels and lay with your friend. ;3
Damn, after all those years this game is still relevant and very enjoyable!

It's valve you know you an absolutely count on quality, this portal far surpasses the previous in many ways, my favorite feature is the ability to both make your own chambers and play other people's uploaded chambers. The campaign has also been expanded and took me about 20 hours to complete which is basically 10x the amount the first one took this really is an incredible experience for anyone who enjoys puzzle games!

grv cool ce jeu la vie. Genre c'est une histoire avec des robots.
et je crois qu'il y a un truc avec des portails aussi mais j'ai pas trop compris
Excelente op√ß√£o para se jogar √† dois, principalmente em √©poca de pandemia.
I mean who doesn't have this game? The humor, story, atmosphere, and personality are some of the best. Do yourself a favor and get this if you haven't already.
Very relaxing game, chill game too.

Outstandingly beautiful game!

I loved this back on my Xbox 360 and I am so glad I replayed this alongside Portal 1. It is a must do fun weekend game, I now want to get all the achievements! 

The graphics, for a game from 2011, are just unreal! I love the story as it builds from Portal 1, gets progressively harder and has a finger biting ending.
Really makes you [b][i]feel[/i][/b] like a portal.

Such a good game with a good story.
Everything is Calculated perfectly so you cant cheese it much as a newbie. (some levels have some cheese but yeah not that major). 
I played both sequals in one sitting starting at something like 14:00 (2pm) till around 4:00 (4am) the next day.
The coop levels are well made but spoil the endgame of the singleplayer a bit.
Overall I loved the story and the game.
7 out of 10

This is my favourite game of all time.
I recommend it absolutely, regardless of your taste in games.
Amazing game. Hands down the best puzzle game out there
One of the best games ever! Great puzzles, great characters & dialog, decent graphics and runs well on my crappy PC.
